card.name: Astral Pathfinder
card.text: When Astral Pathfinder enters, look at the top three cards of your library, then you may reveal a creature card with mana value 3 or less from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Stormborn Griffin
card.text: Flying Threshold — Whenever Stormborn Griffin enters or attacks, surveil 1. If there are seven or more cards in your graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on Stormborn Griffin.

card.name: Forbidding Outsider
card.text: At the beginning of each end step, if you lost 3 or more life this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Forbidding Outsider. Forbidding Outsider has lifelink as long as it has power 4 or greater.

card.name: Worldseeking Existence
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may discard a noncreature card. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Worldseeking Existence.

card.name: Woodland Huntsman
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked with a creature with power 4 or greater this turn, draw a card. {3}{G}: Double target creature's power until end of turn.

card.name: Perennial Journey
card.text: When Perennial Journey enters, create a 1/1 white Human creature token. Creature tokens you control get +1/+0.

card.name: Embrace of the Boundless
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard.

card.name: Behold Shadowed Light
card.text: Mill two cards, then each opponent loses 1 life for each card put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn. Memory {3}{B}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard by paying its memory cost and discarding a card. Then exile it.)

card.name: Rite of Release
card.text: Exile the top X cards of your library, where X was the amount of mana spent to cast Rite of Release. You may play them during your next turn. Reprocess {X}{R}{R} (Cast a copy of this from your graveyard by exiling it and paying {X}{R}{R}. Spend only mana from differently named sources this way.)

card.name: One To Many
card.text: As an additional cost to cast One To Many, sacrifice a creature. Put X +1/+1 counters on each creature you control, where X is the sacrificed creature's power.

card.name: Enlightened Recluse
card.text: Whenever one or more enchantments you control enter for the first time each turn, create a 1/1 white Avatar creature token. As long as you control three or more creatures, Enlightened Recluse gets +1/+2 and has vigilance.

card.name: Starlight Wayfarer
card.text: Whenever you cast an instant spell or a spell with flash, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.) As long as there are five or more instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard, Starlight Wayfarer gets +2/+1 and has flying.

card.name: Nightfall Voyager
card.text: Whenever an opponent loses life for the first time each turn, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.) As long as there are seven or more cards in your graveyard, Nightfall Voyager gets +2/+0 and has menace.

card.name: Chained Terror
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, Chained Terror deals 1 damage to each opponent. As long as an opponent has lost 3 or more life this turn, Chained Terror gets +2/+2.

card.name: Deepgrowth Wraith
card.text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Deepgrowth Wraith. As long as there are three or more counters on Deepgrowth Wraith, it has trample.

card.name: Embodiment of Radiance
card.text: Vigilance Embodiment of Radiance gets +1/+1 for each other creature you control. At the beginning of your end step, create a 1/1 white Avatar creature token.

card.name: Embodiment of Fear
card.text: Menace Embodiment of Fear gets +1/+1 for each card in your graveyard. At the beginning of your end step, mill three cards.

card.name: Embodiment of Wrath
card.text: Haste Embodiment of Wrath gets +1/+1 for each noncreature, nonland permanent you control. At the beginning of your end step, create a treasure token.

card.name: Embodiment of Strength
card.text: Trample Embodiment of Strength gets +1/+1 for each land you control. At the beginning of your end step, search your library for a land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Light the Paths
card.text: Exile up to two target nonland permanents you control, then return up to one of them to your hand and return the other to the battlefield.

card.name: Skywatching
card.text: Skywatching costs {1} less to cast if you've cast another noncreature spell this turn. Look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a noncreature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Devoured by the Boundless
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Devoured by the Boundless, pay X life. Put X -1/-1 counters on target creature.

card.name: Abyssal Bolt
card.text: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.) Abyssal Bolt deals X damage to target creature or planeswalker.

card.name: Might of Inner Fire
card.text: Put X +1/+1 counters on target creature, where X is that creature's power. Flashback {3}{G}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Transformation Aurora
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, you may sacrifice an enchantment. If you do, search your library or graveyard for another enchantment card with mana value 1 greater than the sacrificed enchantment's mana value, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Moonlit Wishes
card.text: When Moonlit Wishes enters, if you cast it, shuffle your hand and graveyard into your library, then draw seven cards. At the beginning of each end step, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying if you drew two or more cards this turn.

card.name: Twilight's Dawn
card.text: When Twilight's Dawn enters, if you cast it, each creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. Whenever a creature dies, its controller loses 1 life.

card.name: Divine Inferno
card.text: At the beginning of each end step, Divine Inferno deals 1 damage to each opponent for each spell they cast this turn. At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn.

card.name: Echoing Heartbeats
card.text: Once each turn, when one or more other permanents enter under your control, you may create a token that's a copy of each of them.

card.name: Depths Soulthief
card.text: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.) When Depths Soulthief enters, destroy target creature with mana value less than or equal to the number of card types among cards exiled with Depths Soulthief.

card.name: Darkness Unchained
card.text: Destroy target creature if it has mana value 3 or less or you have seven or more cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Garden Guardian
card.text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters under your control, you gain 1 life. At the beginning of your end step, draw a card if you've gained 3 or more life this turn.

card.name: Dreams of the Forgotten
card.text: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.) Draw a card for each mana spent to cast Dreams of the Forgotten. You gain 1 life for each card exiled with Dreams of the Forgotten.

card.name: Blue-Flame Bearer
card.text: When Blue-Flame Bearer enters, put two +1/+1 counters on up to one target noncreature permanent. It becomes a creature in addition to its other types. When Blue-Flame Bearer dies, it deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Draconic Dread
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature card in your graveyard. Flying {X}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard with mana value X: Create a token that's a copy of that creature. Activate only once each turn and only as a sorcery.

card.name: Pathbridger
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact you control: You may put an artifact with mana value less than or equal to 1 plus the mana value of the sacrificed artifact from your hand or graveyard onto the battlefield.

card.name: Tranquil Haven
card.text: When Tranquil Haven enters, you gain 3 life. {T}: Add {C}.

card.name: Embodiment of Stars
card.text: Flying Embodiment of Stars gets +1/+1 for each card in your hand. At the beginning of your end step, draw a card.

card.name: Spirit MSY
card.text: Flying

card.name: Treasure MSY
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.
